claim: Gerald Ford succeeded to office as a result of nepotism.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He narrowly lost the presidential election to the Democratic challenger , former Georgia Governor Jimmy Carter , making him the first President who succeeded to office as a result of a mid-term vacancy since Chester A. Arthur not to be elected in his own right .
